alert.note: Alert for Appomattox; Charlotte (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Appomattox, northwestern Charlotte and eastern Campbell Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evergreen, or near Appomattox, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Appomattox... Phenix... Red House... Rustburg... Pamplin City... Madisonville... and Appomattox National Historic Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
